name: Deeds of Destiny
description:
You're an amorphous lump searching for definition. Build character by doing gravity-defying chores and find your true class! Created in two weeks for the PIGSquad Summer Slow Jams - Theme: Character Creator. 

Upon starting, hit ESC to review controls.

Project by Phil Walsh and Thomas Ohashi

Contains mostly original assets. Things we didn't create:

SkySeries Freebie pack (Sky box)

LowlyPoly Materials / Textures (Planet ground)

Some royalty-free jpgs from the interwebs (trash bag material, tree material, etc.)

That's it!
